Question.Subject: Click this link and make my brothers day? (deviantss?)?
Question.Content: http://andylyu.deviantart.com/art/Sunset-153038563 actually it'd be awesomer if you favorited it! Haha I love what he whipped up, and maybe you won't. But idk.. i think he needs some encouragement. dont be rude please! its not my picture, im the one who posted, XD i finally found his deviantart! :D
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Hello,
I like the look of the picture, it looks really creative and I like it; it might seem a little basic but it's still good.
Regards, New York City Police Department NYPD@Hargray.com
